text:
You don’t need a PhD to learn AI. 

I found these 9 free AI courses (with links):

☑ Introduction to ChatGPT: https://lnkd.in/gpVb6J7B

☑ MCP: Build Rich Context AI Apps: https://lnkd.in/eJcEwQnK

☑ Intro to LLMS: https://lnkd.in/dH9qenKa

☑ Meta Data Analyst: https://lnkd.in/dMk_yRZW

☑ AI for Everyone: https://lnkd.in/drqErXpz

☑ Building A Brain in 10 Minutes: https://lnkd.in/dq8zGWCy

☑ Navigating AI in education: https://lnkd.in/gCuM3fpY

☑ Generative AI for beginners: https://lnkd.in/g4-XnPRr

PS: I'm about to launch a new course to create your own Digital Twin with an LLM (like ChatGPT).

Follow me (Ruben) to not miss it.
